required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Peripheral Venous Stent System in the Treatment of Iliac Vein Stenosis or Occlusion
clinical_study.official_title: Safety and Efficacy of Peripheral Venous Stent System in the Treatment of Patients With Iliac Vein Stenosis or Occlusion: a Prospective, Multicentre, Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial.

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhejiang Zylox Medical Device Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Zhejiang Zylox Medical Device Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical study on safety and efficacy of Zylox peripheral venous stent system in the treatment of iliac vein stenosis or occlusion.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Zylox peripheral venous stent system in the treatment of iliac vein stenosis or occlusive lesions compare with conventional venous stent.

primary_outcome.measure: Target vascular patency rate at 12 months after operation

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of major adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Related to death of clinical trials

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Preoperative、Intraoperative、up to 1 month、3 month、6 month、12 month、2 years、3 years、5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse medical events,whether or not related to the medical device

arm_group.description: Percutaneous stent placement in the iliofemoral veins
Percutaneous stent placement in the iliofemoral veins

intervention.description: Self-expanding stent implantation during the index procedure.
Self-expanding stent implantation during the index procedure.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Aged from 18 to 75 years old, male or female
- Subject's target lesions were stenosis and/or occlusion
- CEAP≥C3
- Subjects were able to understand the purpose of the study, demonstrate full compliance with the program and sign informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant woman or who's pregnancy test is positive
- Lactation period woman or woman/man with fertility plan

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
